description: JOYTOY has expanded its Warhammer: The Horus Heresy action figure range with the addition of Sanguinius, Primarch of the IXth Legion. Sanguinius now joins other Primarchs such as Rogal Dorn, Leman Russ, Warmaster Horus, and Magnus the Red in this collection. Standing 18 cm tall, the Sanguinius figure features 32 points of articulation, allowing for...
title: Sanguinius Joins the Horus Heresy Action Figure Range from JOYTOY

description: Axia Miniatures has launched its latest set of 28mm heroic-scale models as part of the Tales of the Old World series, introducing the Witch Scourgers—a group of grim hunters tasked with tracking down heretics and exploring dark ruins. The models reflect the low-fantasy, European Middle Ages-inspired world of the series. Unlike traditional fantasy themes focused...
title: Axia Miniatures Releases New 28mm Witch Scourgers for Tales of the Old World on Kickstarter

description: Roll for Combat has announced the upcoming launch of its new series, “Year of Titans,” set to begin in January 2025. This project follows previous releases in the “Year of” series, including “Year of Monsters” and “Year of Legends,” and will introduce larger ancestries with additional player options and features for both 5th Edition and...
title: Roll for Combat “Year of Titans” Launches January 2025 – Kickstarter Starts in November

description: Double Proficiency has introduced Mycologist’s Primer, a new system-agnostic guide focused on magical mushrooms, lichens, and slime molds for tabletop role-playing games. The book is designed to blend science, folklore, and magic, providing detailed information on 100 species of fungi. It draws inspiration from 19th-century field guides and myths from various cultures. Each entry in...
title: Double Proficiency Introduces Mycologist’s Primer: A Fungi-Focused Resource for Tabletop Role-Playing

description: The cooperative Print-and-Play game Tide & Tangle is set to hit to Kickstarter on October 29. In this game, players take on the roles of Californian sea otters, diving for treasures, navigating ocean waves, and working together to create a safer environment in the Pacific Ocean. The game features artwork by Claire Lin and includes...
title: Tide & Tangle: A Competitive Sea Otter Adventure Game Hits Kickstarter October 29

description: Pelgrane Press has launched the second edition of Trail of Cthulhu, a roleplaying game set in the 1930s, where players investigate mysteries tied to the cosmic horrors of the Cthulhu Mythos. Built on the GUMSHOE system, the game emphasizes uncovering clues and piecing together information to confront terrifying truths. The second edition incorporates two decades...
title: Trail of Cthulhu 2nd Edition Brings Updated Investigation and Horror Mechanics to Backerkit

description: The Ars Magica sourcebook Finis Terrae: El Tribunal de Iberia will be released under the CC-BY-SA 4.0 Open License following a successful crowdfunding campaign. This marks the first significant third-party release for Ars Magica under its new open license, which launched on October 15th. The release is the result of a collaboration between Atlas Games,...
title: Ars Magica’s First Major 3rd-Party Open License Release: Finis Terrae
